item.description:
Come enjoy a summer evening at the Branford Festival. Enjoy good food, crafts, music and good company. We will be joining the New Haven Dining group to listen to Big Shot performing the sounds of Billy Joel at 8:45. The festival takes place on the Branford green, so bring a blanket or a chair for yourself. For food, you can bring your own picnic basket, or buy food from the many vendors.
For Directions and Parking, CLICK HERE.
item.how_to_find_us: "Look for Purple/yellow ballons on the green near the stage

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Summertime Fun: The Branford Festival - Friends, Food and Live Music
